section.title: push_swap_tester
section.para: Script to test Push Swap project

section.title: Usage

literallayout.computeroutput: git clone git@github.com:laisarena/push_swap_tester.git cd push_swap_tester cp ../path_to_push_swap_folder/push_swap . bash tester.sh

section.para: You can change the variable 'NUM_TESTS' which determines how many times the program will be run to calculate the averages of operations, using the flag -n <NUMBER>

You can also choose to test only a specific part of the program using the flag -f, as follows:
-f error : Error management
-f sorted: Check if sorted lists do nothing
-f simple: Lists of size 3 and 5
-f middle: Lists of size 100
-f advanced: Lists of size 500

section.title: Test Log
section.para: You can see the test log into the folder "log_error" $ cd log_error And choose the number of numbers tested into the folders "five", "hundred" and "five_hundred" Then, you can use the command cat to see the content log $ ls five hundred five_hundred $ cd five $ ls test_0 test_5 $ cat test_0 Random list of Five numbers 2 0 1 3 4 sa pb pa sa Qtt commands = 4 Test Checker = KO
